org.battlenight.api.message
Interface Messenger

public interface Messenger

Represents the manager for messaging, both logging and player chat.

Method Summary
 void debug(String message, Object... args)
          Prints a debug message with arguments to the console as long as debugging is enabled.
 String format(String message, Object... args)
          Formats a message with arguments, returning the formatted message.
 void logError(String message, Object... args)
          Prints an error message with arguments to the console.
 void logInfo(String message, Object... args)
          Prints an info message with arguments to the console.
 void logWarning(String message, Object... args)
          Prints a warning message with arguments to the console.
 void reload()
          Reloads the configured messages.
 void send(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender, String message, Object... args)
          Sends a message with arguments to the specified CommandSender.
